title: Ubisoft's E3 2021 Plan - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.15.21
description:
Greg and Tim reunite to talk about Ubi's E3 announcement, Days Gone on PC, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
There is an AMAZING Blessing Show live, and it was shot in Dreams. Thank you Team Pig Detective!
We’re reacting to Resident Evil Village this afternoon at 3 pm PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Later on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
00:08:50 - WORLD PREMIERE TRAILER! - Double Fine’s Amnesia Fortnight
The Roper Report  -
00:13:30 - Ubisoft’s E3 Presentation Announced
00:26:10 - Resident Evil Village Has a Cooking System, Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:30:25 - Days Gone on PC Deets
00:32:50 - Oculus Air Sounds Cool
00:36:44 - F1 2021 is Back, Mike Fahey
00:38:40 - Ad
00:42:20 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:48:28 - What platform would you say is the best place to play indies? - Jordan Lee Rowan
00:53:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Andrea
